reviewText: I wasn't sure about the program as it's a lot less expensive than some others I've seen but the techniques and stress management CD's are excellent! I'd recommend this to anyone seeking to take control of their emotions and find more peace and enjoyment. I look at things completely differently now and feel like I'm the one in charge of my life.

I took a chance on this program as I didn't really know if it would work but I thought I'd give it a try.  AMAZING!!  The cd's are great and not boring, what I've been through on the dvd's and workbook is excellent and all in all I couldn't be happier with my purchase.  If you need a new perspective on life give it a try... great stuff!
